preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE uuid = '8c17b376-1a2b-11e1-a51a-00248140a5eb';

changeSet.comment: Schedule auto-close OPD visits task This task will stop all active visits that match the visit type(s) specified by the value of the global property 'visits.autoCloseVisitType'. The task will run daily at midnight.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO openmrs.scheduler_task_config (name,description,schedulable_class,start_time,start_time_pattern,repeat_interval,start_on_startup,started,created_by,date_created,changed_by,date_changed,last_execution_time,uuid) VALUES ('Auto Close Visits Task','Stops all active visits that match the visit type(s) specified by the value of the global property ''visits.autoCloseVisitType''','org.openmrs.scheduler.tasks.AutoCloseVisitsTask','2024-11-28 00:00:00','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',86400,1,1,1,'2018-06-04 18:30:16',1,'2024-11-27 11:54:11','2024-11-27 11:49:00','8c17b376-1a2b-11e1-a51a-00248140a5eb')

changeSet.comment: Delete multiple concepts from Tests Orderability concept set The concept set UUID is 'a781d229-0de6-44c0-86ab-2194aae85f77' The concepts to be removed are: 'Serum magnesium', 'Reticulocytes (%)', 'Direct bilirubin', 'Indirect bilirubin', 'Ionized calcium', 'Red blood cells', 'Mean corpuscular hemoglobin', 'Urobilinogen in urine by test strip'
changeSet.sql: DELETE cs FROM concept_set cs JOIN concept c1 ON cs.concept_id = c1.concept_id JOIN concept c2 ON cs.concept_set = c2.concept_id WHERE c2.uuid = 'a781d229-0de6-44c0-86ab-2194aae85f77' AND c1.uuid IN ( 'add9cf99-9b28-44db-80bd-cc6eba22b6c8', 'abc13cdd-16b1-4bc0-86a3-588531d50da5', '37c3b841-9959-4d1b-b952-0444f98d72a4', '1cbc3383-088d-408c-9933-bb00fd0cfb6f', '39ba3592-b4ef-4e2f-968a-b5f82d5ceb59', 'ff00d86d-69e5-4c9e-beea-ce642e6c4643', '83eaf4f6-0508-4c1c-87c5-b61b66a66135', '867e50a0-f749-4952-8769-1f301e157f8b' );
